name: Andy Blast Vs The Forces of Evil 2.0 (Love2D)
name_original: Andy Blast Vs The Forces of Evil 2.0 (Love2D)
description:
The third iteration of Andy Blast Vs The Forces of Evil written in LUA for LOVE2D.

Based on the game "Dangerous Dave & The Haunted Mansion" by id Software.

The Alpha Demo currently consists of one complete level and is being uploaded for crowdsource testing. I would appreciate any and all feedback regarding the current
development/bugs/issues/etc.

I've added a "Name your own price" for this title and any donations/purchases will help spur me closer to completing the game, but feel (guilt) free downloading it for free and enjoying what's there!

Please leave a comment below with any feedback!
